finishes.description: Organize your wood finish products with pricing, descriptions, and application recommendations.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.text: Welcome to Grain ("we", "our", "us"). These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our woodworking project management application and services. By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these terms.

acceptance.title: 2. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text: By creating an account or using our service, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

accounts.title: 3. User Accounts
accounts.text: When you create an account with us, you agree to:
accounts.point1: Provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration
accounts.point2: Maintain the security of your password and account credentials
accounts.point3: Accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account

dataProtection.title: 4. Data Protection and Privacy (Costa Rica Law 8968)
dataProtection.text: In compliance with Costa Rica's Law 8968 on the Protection of Personal Data (Ley de Protección de la Persona frente al Tratamiento de sus Datos Personales), we are committed to protecting your personal information:
dataProtection.point1: We collect only the minimum personal data necessary to provide our services (name, email, username)
dataProtection.point2: Your personal data is stored securely and protected against unauthorized access
dataProtection.point3: We process your data solely for the purpose of providing our woodworking project management services
dataProtection.point4: Your data will not be transferred to third parties without your explicit consent
dataProtection.point5: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure data security

rights.title: 5. Your Data Rights (ARCO Rights)
rights.text: Under Costa Rica Law 8968, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
rights.point1: Access: Request information about what personal data we hold about you
rights.point2: Rectification: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
rights.point3: Cancellation: Request deletion of your personal data from our systems
rights.point4: Opposition: Object to certain types of data processing
rights.point5: Portability: Request a copy of your data in a structured, commonly used format

useOfService.title: 6. Use of Service
useOfService.text: You agree to use our service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms. You agree not to:
useOfService.point1: Use the service in any way that violates any applicable law or regulation
useOfService.point2: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems or other users' accounts
useOfService.point3: Interfere with or disrupt the service or servers connected to the service

userContent.title: 7. User Content and Data
userContent.text: You retain all rights to the project data, lumber inventory, and other content you create in our service. We claim no ownership over your content. You grant us only the limited license necessary to operate and provide the service to you.

noDataSale.title: 8. We Do Not Sell Your Data
noDataSale.text: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information or project data to third parties. Your data is used exclusively to provide you with our services.

liability.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
liability.text: Our service is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of the service. Project calculations and estimates are provided as tools to assist your planning and should be verified independently.

changes.title: 10. Changes to Terms
changes.text: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes via email or through the service. Your continued use of the service after such modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

governingLaw.title: 11. Governing Law
governingLaw.text: These Terms and Conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Costa Rica. Any disputes arising from these terms or your use of the service shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Costa Rica.

contact.title: 12. Contact Information
contact.text: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, your data rights, or wish to exercise your ARCO rights, please contact us through your account settings or the contact information provided in the application.
